speaker: RIVERS
text:
Madam
              ,
               
              what
               
              makes
               
              you
               
              in
               
              this
               
              sudden
               
              change
              ?

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Why
              ,
               
              brother
               
              Rivers
              ,
               
              are
               
              you
               
              yet
               
              to
               
              learn

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
What
               
              late
               
              misfortune
               
              is
               
              befall’n
               
              King
               
              Edward
              ?

speaker: RIVERS
text:
What
              ,
               
              loss
               
              of
               
              some
               
              pitched
               
              battle
               
              against
               
              Warwick
              ?

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
No
              ,
               
              but
               
              the
               
              loss
               
              of
               
              his
               
              own
               
              royal
               
              person
              .

text:
Then
               
              is
               
              my
               
              sovereign
               
              slain
              ?

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              almost
               
              slain
              ,
               
              for
               
              he
               
              is
               
              taken
               
              prisoner
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Either
               
              betrayed
               
              by
               
              falsehood
               
              of

QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Or

              his
               
              foe

              at

              ;

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
And
              ,
               
              as
               
              I
               
              further
               
              have
               
              to
               
              understand
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Is
               
              new
               
              committed
               
              to
               
              the
               
              Bishop
               
              of
               
              York
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Fell
               
              Warwick’s
               
              brother
               
              and
               
              by
               
              that
               
              our
               
              foe
              .

speaker: RIVERS
text:
These
               
              news
               
              I
               
              must
               
              confess
               
              are
               
              full
               
              of
               
              grief
              ;

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Yet
              ,
               
              gracious
               
              madam
              ,
               
              bear
               
              it
               
              as
               
              you
               
              may
              .

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Warwick
               
              may
               
              lose
               
              that
               
              now
               
              hath
               
              won
               
              the
               
              day
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Till
               
              then
               
              fair
               
              hope
               
              must
               
              hinder
               
              life’s
               
              decay
              ;

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
And
               
              I
               
              the
               
              rather
               
              wean
               
              me
               
              from
               
              despair

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
For
               
              love
               
              of
               
              Edward’s
               
              offspring
               
              in
               
              my
               
              womb
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
This
               
              is
               
              it
               
              that
               
              makes
               
              me

              passion

QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
And
               
              bear
               
              with
               
              mildness
               
              my
               
              misfortune’s
               
              cross
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              ay
              ,
               
              for
               
              this
               
              I
               
              draw
               
              in
               
              many
               
              a
               
              tear

QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
And
               
              stop
               
              the
               
              rising
               
              of
               
              blood-sucking

              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Lest
               
              with
               
              my

              or

              I
               
              blast
               
              or

QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH

King
               
              Edward’s
               
              fruit
              ,
               
              true
               
              heir
               
              to
               
              th’
               
              English
               
              crown
              .

speaker: RIVERS
text:
But
              ,
               
              madam
              ,
               
              where
               
              is
               
              Warwick
               
              then
               
              become
              ?

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
I

              that

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
To
               
              set

              once
               
              more
               
              on

              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Guess
               
              thou
               
              the
               
              rest
              :
               
              King
               
              Edward’s
               
              friends
               
              must
               
              down
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:

              to

              the
               
              tyrant’s

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
For

              that
               
              hath
               
              once
               
              broken
               
              faith
              —

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
I’ll
               
              hence

              unto
               
              the

QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
To
               
              save
               
              at

              the

              of

              right
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
There

              rest

              from

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH
text:
Come

QUEEN
               
              ELIZABETH

If
